The Tasseldale garrison was a fortification in Scardale Town established by Tasseldale during the coalition occupation of Scardale in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Early on in the occupation of Scardale, the garrison forces of Talonshield mercenaries had been bribed by Lady Sashesh to shift their allegiance to Sembia. The companys commander, Mairshar Hareth Windtamer, was unaware as to why his soldiers had a change of loyalty.
